about_the_game:
Take on the role of private eye Brie Parmesan, the best rat detective in Chicatgo, as he outwits and outmaneuvers the Cat Meowfia and other obstacles to uncover evidence and solve the case. Avoid detection as you navigate your way through the streets and speakeasies of Chicatgo in search of the smoking gun that will bring the Cat Meowfia down for good.


The Cat Meowfia has taken control of milk production and it's up to you to put a stop to it. Follow the trail of evidence through multiple locations to collect clues, cheese, and powerups and grind their operations to a halt. Along the way find hidden caches and uncover new areas to help you on your way.


The Meowfia runs the streets of Chicatgo, so watch out for guards and bosses. Stay out of their line of sight and keep the noise down. If they catch you you’ll be swimming with the fishes…


Run, jump, or sneak your way past guards, pick locks to get to secure locations, collect cheese, and ultimately collect enough evidence to unlock new locations and solve the case.

Play as Brie Parmesan in this isometric stealth adventure. Brie Parmesan Mysteries combines elements of classic stealth and collectible gameplay with a charming Art Deco style and brooding atmosphere to bring players a fresh and entertaining gaming experience with a pinch of humour. Pick locks and sneak past guards to find enough hidden evidence to unlock new locations and solve the case. Trade cheese to back-alley characters for power-ups and add to your evidence count at the end of each level. Find just enough collectibles to advance the case or go back for seconds and experience it all.

Take on the role of private eye Brie Parmesan, the best rat detective in Chicatgo, as he outwits and outmaneuvers the Cat Meowfia and other obstacles to uncover evidence and solve the case. Avoid detection as you navigate your way through the streets and speakeasies of Chicatgo in search of the smoking gun that will bring the Cat Meowfia down for good.


The Cat Meowfia has taken control of milk production and it's up to you to put a stop to it. Follow the trail of evidence through multiple locations to collect clues, cheese, and powerups and grind their operations to a halt. Along the way find hidden caches and uncover new areas to help you on your way.


The Meowfia runs the streets of Chicatgo, so watch out for guards and bosses. Stay out of their line of sight and keep the noise down. If they catch you you’ll be swimming with the fishes…


Run, jump, or sneak your way past guards, pick locks to get to secure locations, collect cheese, and ultimately collect enough evidence to unlock new locations and solve the case.

Brie Parmesan Mysteries combines elements of classic stealth and collectible gameplay with a charming Art Deco style and brooding atmosphere to bring players a fresh and entertaining gaming experience with a pinch of humour. Find just enough collectibles to advance the case or go back for seconds and experience it all.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS Holo 3.4.6
  • Processor: AMD Custom APU 0405
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Custom GPU 0405 (vangogh)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SteamOS Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: None
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS Holo 3.4.6
  • Processor: AMD Custom APU 0405
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Custom GPU 0405 (vangogh)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SteamOS Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: None

name: Brie Parmesan Mysteries

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 1.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel IrisX, Nvidia GTX Series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • VR Support: None

short_description: Sneak past guards, follow the cheese, find evidence in this isometric stealth adventure. Play as Brie Parmesan, a master detective and a rat working to undermine the criminal underworld of Chicatgo. Can you find enough evidence to solve case and bring the Cat Meowfia to justice?
